description:
https://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/83404013cb53aef16b97b5616c0627c50af76ac8 added the simple_tenant_links in the response for paging simple tenant usage but there isn't a description of the link response parameter for v2.40 in the API reference:

http://developer.openstack.org/api-ref/compute/?expanded=show-usage-statistics-for-tenant-detail,list-tenant-usage-statistics-for-all-tenants-detail#usage-reports-os-simple-tenant-usage
title: 'tenant_usage_links' isn't described in the v2.40 os-simple-tenant-usage API reference

comments.content:
https://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/83404013cb53aef16b97b5616c0627c50af76ac8 added the simple_tenant_links in the response for paging simple tenant usage but there isn't a description of the link response parameter for v2.40 in the API reference:

http://developer.openstack.org/api-ref/compute/?expanded=show-usage-statistics-for-tenant-detail,list-tenant-usage-statistics-for-all-tenants-detail#usage-reports-os-simple-tenant-usage
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:

commit 38a1edf636612b72ed665e5afbe6e3af646ac40d
Author: Diana Clarke <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Dec 19 17:18:29 2016 -0500

    Missing usage next links in api-ref
    
    Microversion 2.40 added paging to simple tenant usage, complete with
    "next" links, but the api-ref response documentation wasn't updated to
    include them.
    
    Change-Id: Iaf2d71cc45b896ccb00271fd455befd24f1efadd
    Closes-Bug: #1651254
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 15.0.0.0b3 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
